ygData.subject: Re: Pulsating brood clutch (off-topic)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Crookstinger and Equestrielle are both old (in fact, there was a story on the Vault a few weeks back about Equestrielle being slain!).  Equestrielle, I
ygData.messageBody:
At 12:44 PM 5/27/99 -1000, you wrote:
>On a related note, I saw three other named NPCs in Lesser Faydark last
>night. One was Crookstinger, a NPC wasp, another was a named fairie whose
>name I can't recollect, and the unicorn Equestrielle. In addition to the
>Spider Queen, I had never seen any of these NPCs before. There were several
>groups in the area attacking both wasps and fairie creatures. The general
>consensus of everyone in the area was that killing these creatures caused
>Crookstinger and the named fairie to appear. No one was foolish/brave
>enough to attack the unicorn. Its good to see that Verant has started to
>beef up some of the zones. Has anyone notived similar additions in other
>zones?

Crookstinger and Equestrielle are both old (in fact, there was a story on
the Vault a few weeks back about Equestrielle being slain!). Equestrielle,
I gather (from the times I've followed the unicorn) is just a wandering,
non-aggro high-level critter. Crookstinger is rumoured to carry a magical
weapon - which is why it was being hunted, I'm sure. I'd never heard of it
spawning before, so I assume that either 1) it's rare, or 2) it's been
reimplemented.
No clue about the fairie, though.

Talies the Wanderer
